TopicTitle: Kpax! Home of the Kraken! Mysterious planet X!

Articles.Content:
We all know the Space Kraken, right? the monster that destroys all that travel out of the kerbol system. well, why do you think he does that? he is a guard, of the Planet Kpax! the home of the Space Kraken kind! it is like Laythe, all water and a little land, but the highly advance Krakens have also developed space flight but they understand the existence of the little Kebals and feel threatened, so they put up a guard up to keep the kerbals away. but now that they have no more guard. so they are arming themselves to attack Kerbin and destroy the kerbals before they destroy them. all hope is lost! but we have one secret weapon:

JEB!

PREPARE FORE WAR!

*BREAKING OF CHARACTER BELOW!*

please post your own Kpax related stuff below like drawings of it, the Kraken Armada, Videos, stories, that kind of stuff. I think it's fun to see how people create such cool stuff from so little maybe one day we'll have a planet Kpax!
